          <title>
            <string language="en">Gas pressure inside a cylinder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gasdruck innerhalb eines Zylinders</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pression de gaz à l'intérieur d'un cylindre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pressão de gás dentro de um cilindro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pressione del gas all'interno di un cilindro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αέριο πίεση μέσα σε έναν κύλινδρο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presión de gas dentro de un cilindro</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows application of force on four cylinders with different amounts of gas molecules.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cylinder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">Gas</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">piston</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt Anwendung der Kraft auf 
vier Zylindern mit unterschiedlichen Mengen Gasmolekülen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'application de la 
force sur quatre cylindres avec différentes quantités de molécules 
de gaz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a aplicação da força 
em quatro cilindros com quantidades diferentes de moléculas do gás.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'applicazione di 
forza su quattro cilindri con differenti importi delle molecole del 
gas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει εφαρμογή της δύναμης σε 
τέσσερις κυλίνδρους με τα διαφορετικά ποσά αέριο μορίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la aplicación de la 
fuerza en cuatro cilindros con diversas cantidades de moléculas del 
gas.</string>
          </description>
